statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: John Holland scored 28 points and Boston University defeated Canisius 70-62 on Saturday for its sixth consecutive win.
article.headline: John Holland-led BU notches sixth consecutive win
article.linkText: Holland-led BU notches sixth consecutive win
article.story: BOSTON -- John Holland scored 28 points and Boston University defeated Canisius 70-62 on Saturday for its sixth consecutive win. Holland, a senior, has scored in double figures in 102 of 124 games. Darryl Partin added 20 points for the Terriers. The pair combined to take 33 of the Terriers' 50 field-goal attempts -- Holland was 8 of 19; Partin 7 of 14. Canisius led 32-29 at halftime and the score was tied five times in the second half before the Terriers took the lead for good. Partin hit a 3-pointer for a 50-47 lead with 9:49 to play. The Terriers led by at least five points over the final three minutes. The Terriers (16-13) hit 7 of 9 free throws in the final 40 seconds to secure the win. Elton Frazier scored 16 points, Greg Logins added 13 and Gaby Belardo had 12 for the Golden Griffins (13-14), who have lost three games in a row.
